entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along the coast. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
